description: The cloud config defines IaaS specific configuration used by the Director and all deployments. It allows us to separate IaaS specific configuration into its own file and keep deployment manifests IaaS agnostic.

az_ref.title: Availability Zone
az_ref.description: An availability zone configured with cloud-config.

disk_type_ref.title: Disk Type
disk_type_ref.description: A disk type configured with cloud-config.

vm_extension_ref.title: VM Extension
vm_extension_ref.description: A VM extension configured with cloud-config.

vm_type_ref.title: VM Type
vm_type_ref.description: A VM type configured with cloud-config.

azs.description: Specifies the AZs available to deployments. At least one should be specified.

name.description: Name of an AZ within the Director.

cloud_properties.description: Describes any IaaS-specific properties needed to associated with AZ; for most IaaSes, some data here is actually required.

azs.title: Availability Zones

az.description: Name of the AZ defined in AZs section to use for creating compilation VMs.
az.title: Availability Zone

cloud_properties.description: Describes any IaaS-specific properties needed to create VMs.

network.description: References a valid network name defined in the Networks block. BOSH assigns network properties to compilation VMs according to the type and properties of the specified network.
network.title: Network

reuse_compilation_vms.description: If `false`, BOSH creates a new compilation VM for each new package compilation and destroys the VM when compilation is complete. If `true`, compilation VMs are re-used when compiling packages.
reuse_compilation_vms.title: Reuse Compilation VMs

vm_resources.description: Specifies generic VM resources such as CPU, RAM and disk size that are automatically translated into correct VM cloud properties to determine VM size. VM size is determined on best effort basis as some IaaSes may not support exact size configuration.

vm_type.description: Name of the VM type defined in VM types section to use for creating compilation VMs. Alternatively, you can specify the `vm_resources`, or `cloud_properties` key.
vm_type.title: VM Type

workers.description: The maximum number of compilation VMs.
workers.title: Workers

disk_types.description: Specifies the [disk types](http://bosh.io/docs/terminology.html#disk-types) available to deployments. At least one should be specified.

name.description: A unique name used to identify and reference the disk type.
name.title: Name

disk_size.description: Specifies the disk size. disk_size must be a positive integer. BOSH creates a [persistent disk](http://bosh.io/docs/persistent-disks.html) of that size in megabytes and attaches it to each job instance VM.
disk_size.title: Disk Size

disk_types.title: Disk Types

networks.description: Each sub-block listed in the Networks block specifies a network configuration that jobs can reference. There are three different network types: manual, dynamic, and vip. At least one should be specified.

oneOf.title: Dynamic Network
oneOf.description: The Director defers IP selection to the IaaS.

name.description: Name used to reference this network configuration.

cloud_properties.description: Describes any IaaS-specific properties for the subnet.

dns.description: DNS IP addresses for this subnet

oneOf.title: Manual Network
oneOf.description: The Director decides how to assign IPs to each job instance based on the specified network subnets in the deployment manifest.

name.description: Name used to reference this network configuration.

az.description: AZ associated with this subnet (should only be used when using [first class AZs](http://bosh.io/docs/azs/)).

azs.description: List of AZs associated with this subnet (should only be used when using [first class AZs](http://bosh.io/docs/azs/)).

cloud_properties.description: Describes any IaaS-specific properties for the subnet.

dns.description: DNS IP addresses for this subnet

range.description: Subnet IP range that includes all IPs from this subnet

reserved.description: Array of reserved IPs and/or IP ranges. BOSH does not assign IPs from this range to any VM

static.description: Array of static IPs and/or IP ranges. BOSH assigns IPs from this range to jobs requesting static IPs. Only IPs specified here can be used for static IP reservations.

oneOf.title: Virtual IP
oneOf.description: The Director allows one-off IP assignments to specific jobs to enable flexible IP routing (e.g. elastic IP).

name.description: Name used to reference this network configuration.

networks.title: Networks

vm_extensions.description: Specifies the VM extensions available to deployments.

name.description: A unique name used to identify and reference the VM extension.
name.title: Name

cloud_properties.description: Describes any IaaS-specific properties needed to create VMs.
cloud_properties.title: Cloud Properties

vm_extensions.title: VM Extensions

vm_types.description: Specifies the VM types available to deployments. At least one should be specified.

name.description: A unique name used to identify and reference the VM type.
name.title: Name
